resources.string: Network acceleration requires a local VPN

You need to authorize our application to create a VPN connection. steam++ does not route your traffic through a remote server, so the acceleration is done on your device. If you tap OK, you will see a system dialog asking for your approval.
This certificate needs to be installed in order for Network Acceleration to work properly.
The certificate is unique, generated by your device, and stored locally on the device.
Please save the certificate. The next step describes how to install it manually.
How do I install the certificate?
5. Ignore the warning message and click [Install]
